quest.name: Shadowed Footsteps
journal: Nidhana regards you with those eyes you could drown in.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Hmm... You are a capable warrior too, are you not? Would you be amenable to assisting me with another errand?

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: You see, our talisman requires the use of a special ink, but we have exhausted our stores of a key ingredient for it─spiritweed.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: The herb grows not far from here, and I would like to go and harvest some. With the recent spate of kidnappings, however, we Arkasodara travel alone at our peril.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Will you not come with me as my escort? I would compensate you for your troubles, of course.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: I'm in your debt! Without further ado, let us head to Kadjaya's Footsteps. It is situated on the road which runs east of the Great Work.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: I-I may simply be imagining it, but I feel as though we're being followed...

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: <gasp> Look out, Forename!

dialogue.name: BALLON
dialogue.text: Target found...

dialogue.name: BALLON
dialogue.text: Subdue and capture...

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Gods, but that gave me a fright... To think that the moment I ventured outside the safety of the Work...

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Thank the Sisters I asked you to come with me. You're all right, I hope?

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Good, good. Let's continue on, then. It isn't far now─just through these pillars and up the rise.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: And here we are─Kadjaya's Footsteps.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Kadjaya was a great dancer, and those who follow in her─well, you know─they come to this place to train and dedicate their dance to their ancestors.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: A happy benefit of this is that spiritweed grows here in abundance. I will set about harvesting at once, if you would be so good as to stand guard.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: The kidnappers aren't like to return soon, but better safe than sorry.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: I'll gather the herb as quickly as I can. Please stand guard for me.

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: I have enough spiritweed to last us a good while. Thank you for keeping watch!

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Let us head back to the Great Work, shall we?

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: Forename, my thanks again for your assistance. With your help, we're that little bit closer to completing our talisman!

dialogue.name: NIDHANA
dialogue.text: This isn't much, but please accept it as a token of my gratitude.
